Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Relates to increasing sales of zero-emission vehicles
Summary: Provides for the issuance of certificates of registration for entities that manufacture or assemble zero-emissions vehicles and have no franchised motor vehicle dealers in New York if the sale of zero-emission vehicles in the state fail to meet certain targets.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0306-b, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to increasing sales of zero-emission vehicles
